00040 double RigidTransformationEstimationSVD::estimateTransformation(std::vector<CorrespondencePoint3DPair>* pointPairs, IHomogeneousMatrix44* resultTransformation) {
00041         double resultError = -1.0;
00042         bool quiet = true;
00043         icp6Dminimizer *errorMinimizer = new icp6D_SVD(quiet);
00044 
00045         vector<PtPair> minimizerPointPairs;
00046         double* alignxf = new double [16];
00047         double centroid_m[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00048         double centroid_d[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00049 
00050         /* convert data structures */
00051         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pointPairs->size(); ++i) {
00052                 double firstPoint[3];
00053                 firstPoint[0] = (*pointPairs)[i].firstPoint.getX();
00054                 firstPoint[1] = (*pointPairs)[i].firstPoint.getY();
00055                 firstPoint[2] = (*pointPairs)[i].firstPoint.getZ();
00056 
00057                 double secondPoint[3];
00058                 secondPoint[0] = (*pointPairs)[i].secondPoint.getX();
00059                 secondPoint[1] = (*pointPairs)[i].secondPoint.getY();
00060                 secondPoint[2] = (*pointPairs)[i].secondPoint.getZ();
00061 
00062                 PtPair pair;
00063                 pair.p1 = firstPoint;
00064                 pair.p2 = secondPoint;
00065                 minimizerPointPairs.push_back(pair);
00066 
00067                 /* calculate centroids */
00068                 centroid_m[0] += firstPoint[0]; //TODO: why flipped  _m and _d in 6DSLAM code?!?
00069                 centroid_m[1] += firstPoint[1];
00070                 centroid_m[2] += firstPoint[2];
00071                 centroid_d[0] += secondPoint[0];
00072                 centroid_d[1] += secondPoint[1];
00073                 centroid_d[2] += secondPoint[2];
00074         }
00075 
00076         centroid_m[0] /= minimizerPointPairs.size();
00077         centroid_m[1] /= minimizerPointPairs.size();
00078         centroid_m[2] /= minimizerPointPairs.size();
00079         centroid_d[0] /= minimizerPointPairs.size();
00080         centroid_d[1] /= minimizerPointPairs.size();
00081         centroid_d[2] /= minimizerPointPairs.size();
00082 
00083 //      cout << "centroid of pointCloud1 " << centroid_m[0] << ", " << centroid_m[1] << ", " << centroid_m[2] << endl; //DBG output
00084 //      cout << "centroid of pointCloud2 " << centroid_d[0] << ", " << centroid_d[1] << ", " << centroid_d[2] << endl;
00085 
00086         resultError = errorMinimizer->Point_Point_Align(minimizerPointPairs, alignxf, centroid_m, centroid_d);
00087 //      for (int i = 0; i < 16; ++i) { // DBG output
00088 //              cout << alignxf[i];
00089 //              if (((i+1)%4) == 0) {
00090 //                      cout << endl;
00091 //              }
00092 //      }
00093 
00094         double* resultRawData;
00095         resultRawData = resultTransformation->setRawData();
00096         for (int i = 0; i < 16; ++i) {
00097                 resultRawData[i] = alignxf[i];
00098         }
00099 
00100         delete errorMinimizer;
00101 
00102         return resultError;
00103 }
00104 
00105 }
